0.name: Onglet de réserve supplémentaire
0.description: Ajoute un onglet à votre réserve partagée.

1.name: Mise à niveau vers un onglet de réserve premium
1.description: Mets à niveau un onglet de votre réserve partagée pour en faire un onglet premium. Vous pouvez modifier à tout moment le nom et la couleur des onglets premium.
1.description2: Premium stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

2.name: Onglet de réserve premium
2.description: Ajoute un onglet premium à votre réserve partagée. Vous pouvez modifier à tout moment le nom et la couleur des onglets premium.
2.description2: Premium stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

3.name: Personnage supplémentaire
3.description: Ajoute un emplacement pour personnage à votre compte.

4.name: Lot d'onglets de réserve
4.description: Ajoute six onglets à votre réserve partagée (à prix réduit).

5.name: Lot d'onglets de réserve premium
5.description: Ajoute six onglets premium à votre réserve partagée (à prix réduit). Vous pouvez modifier à tout moment le nom et la couleur des onglets premium.
5.description2: Premium stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

6.name: Currency Stash Tab
6.description: Add a Currency Stash Tab to your account. Currency Stash Tabs can hold 5000 of many currency types.
6.description2: Currency stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

7.name: Currency Stash Tab
7.description: Add a Currency Stash Tab to your account. Currency Stash Tabs can hold 5000 of many currency types.
7.description2: Currency stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

8.name: Currency Tab Bundle
8.description: Add a Currency Stash Tab to your account. Currency Stash Tabs can hold 5000 of many currency types.
8.description2: Currency stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

10.name: Special Stash Tab Bundle
10.description: Contains the Divination, Premium Quad and Essence Stash tabs (at a discounted price).

11.name: Divination Stash Tab
11.description: Add a Divination Stash Tab to your account. Divination Stash Tabs can hold 5000 of each Divination Card.
11.description2: Divination stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

12.name: Premium Quad Stash Tab
12.description: Add a premium Quad Stash Tab to your account. Premium Quad Stash Tabs have four times the space of regular Stash Tabs.
12.description2: Premium Quad stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.

13.name: Essence Stash Tab
13.description: Add an Essence Tab to your account. Essence Stash Tabs can hold 5000 of each Essence type.
13.description2: Essence stash tabs can be listed as public, allowing them to integrate with community trade tools.
